K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-1: badzra dunda n'a ma n'a ga sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-3: rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g-yog 'dor na bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-6: 'khor 'dus pa chen po 'jog po la sogs pa klu'i 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-8: mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-9: bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba bde bar byed pa'i chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342a-10: de nas grong khyer de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyab ma spyan zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-0: longs spyod @342b che ba; rdzas ngang yo byad mang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-2: rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-5: de yang yang dang yang du klu 'gugs cing me'i sbyin sreg byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-6: bram ze de 'i lo tog smin kar char chad par gyur nas des nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang mthun pas 'di skad ces bdag gis char ba'i rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-8: des me'i sbyin sreg bya bar bshams nas til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-10: yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang bsregs te sbyin sreg byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-11: de nas klu mi srun pa zhig gi gzugs byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-12: des lcags kyi phur bu la bsngags nas klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-13: klu'i spyi bo gas nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-14: klu de yang cher 'khrugs te khros nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rdul 'byung ba'i 'od zer tsha ba rang gi lus las bkye ste gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:342b-15: de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-0: me'i sbyin sreg byed pa btang nas de bcom ldan 'das la @343a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-3: dpung gnyen btsal te 'bros par bsam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-5: klu khro bo bdag gi srog ma srungs 'tshal te skyabs su yang ma mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-15: zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-18: mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang klu mi bgrungs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343a-20: khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi slad na slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rten ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-0: lo @343b tog thams cad kyi don tu lo tog rnams tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-2: rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par gyur pa lo tog yongs su skyong zhing klu zlog pa de bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-4: lag na rdo rjes klu rab tu 'gro bar byed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-5: phyag rgya sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-7: de myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo tog thams cad myur du bskyang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-9: me'i ri sul chen po so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-10: me lce 'bar ba'i rim pa'i sprin chen po nam mkha' lding 'dab ma gdengs pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi rim pas nam mkhar khebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-13: 'bras bu thams cad kun tu srung ste gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-14: des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun tu rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:343b-15: klu mi bgrungs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di bka' stsal to; ;na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-6: na mo bha ga ba te sh'akya r'a dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-9: d'ipta be ga ma h'a ba de bha ga ba te ma h'a tsanda hri da ya sa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-10: hu ru hu ru; ha ra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-13: sarba sa sya n'a sh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-14: n'a ku la bam shandha ra dha ra pra sa ra tsanda be ga ma h'a ba la pa r'a kra ma spu ri ta roo dra b'aktra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-16: pra dzva la m'a la dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-18: pra ba ra bi mandh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-19: h'um h'um ba la ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-22: bi sa ra bi sa ra sa ranti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-23: sarba sa dri sya na n'a ma dri ba na ya dri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-26: aa ba sarb'antu sarba n'a ga to sha sarba ba bha ba bha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-27: be ga ta be ga ba ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-29: n'a ga bi sa ra ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-30: dzva la m'a li ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-31: badzva la m'a li ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-0: klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa 'di bshad @344b ma thag tu klu dang klu chen po thams cad klad pa na par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-1: lus rul te lus rnag shing dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-3: sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi gzad pa dag bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-5: bdag cag gi nongs ba bgyid pa mi dran du lags kyis kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-7: rig 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-11: gnod ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-17: sad dang rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-18: ha cang char che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-20: dus ma lags par char 'bab bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-22: rig pa 'dzin pa sngags smra bas byams pa la gnas par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-23: byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-24: byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-25: byams pas gnod pa bgyid pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:344b-26: deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bdag dam bca' bar 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-0: gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di @345a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-1: rab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-2: gang na snying po gzung 'dis srung bar bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-5: yongs su bskyang bar bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-8: dkyil 'khor gyis ris bcad par bgyis pa dar bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-11: 'bras bu thams cad kun tu srung bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-16: bya rnams kyang kun tu srung bar 'tshal to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-17: slang kyis kyang ma rungs bar mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-21: khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-22: khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs bar srung bas srung bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-23: de nas de'i 'og tu cho gar bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-24: lo tog la gnod par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-25: de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas zhing gi dbus sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345a-27: gnas mthon por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang [?] bzhi gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-0: me to sil mas gcal bkram ste bzhag @345b go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-2: 'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil ba bdun bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-3: gzugs re re zhing yang gzugs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-7: phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-8: padma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-9: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bshag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-14: sngags lan drug cur yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-15: seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-16: lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-17: thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-19: bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-21: seng ldeng gi phur bu de dag kyang snying gar nub par gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-22: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-23: shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-24: nub phyogs su mgo brgyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-25: lho phyogs su mgol nga pa'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-26: byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo dgu ba gshag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-28: pog phor re re ste lnga gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:345b-30: bra yos su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-0: gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir gzugs @346a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-2: zhing gi dbus su yang gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-3: skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su yang gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-4: de btsugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-5: ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-8: 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-9: tha na 'dam ma gcig kyang bskams par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-11: sdong bu bskams par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-12: srog chags kyi rigs ri dvags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-13: bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-14: ma rungs par byed kyang mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-19: dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-20: klu'i gnod pa byas kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-21: ma rungs pa zhig tu gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-22: de yang slar rtas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-26: bum pa chen po nang na yod pa de yang zhing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-28: skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346a-29: srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-2: gor sbyar thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-3: tha na phye ma leb la sogs pa yang nam yang mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-4: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-6: sgo nga las skyes pa'i bar gyis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-7: rlan dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du nam yang mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-8: phur bu ma phyung gi bar klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-13: 'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-16: klu thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-19: phye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-23: shing ljon pa rnams la gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-24: srog chags thams cad lhung zhing med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-25: srin bu tree ma bu ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-29: srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:346b-31: zhing gi phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i las bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-0: mar bsres te sbyin sreg byas @347a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-1: na; zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-2: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-4: cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha' dag bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-6: drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-7: rdo rje 'dzin bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-11: seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la lan stong yongs su bzlas pa byas te khang steng du btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-15: ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-19: 'dab ma ma rungs par byed pa'i srog chags rnams med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347a-27: bi sha ki ta ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-0: mchu ring la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad med par 'gyur @347b ro; ;mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-10: ri skegs la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-11: sngags 'dis phur bu la yongs su bzlas par byas te phyogs bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-13: aom ki li mi li tsande /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-16: de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pas gzungs 'di thos nas de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-18: bdag gis srog chags kyi rigs gnod par sems pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-19: rab tu gnod par sems pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-25: rtsa ba ma rungs par bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-28: phyogs bzhi kun nas dpag tshad du mtshams bcad pa chen po bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-31: slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gnod par sems pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-32: rab tu gnod par sems pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:347b-33: sngags kyi tshig rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-1: can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-2: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-6: sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-10: ldum ra yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzugs kyi sngags kyi tshig smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-11: de nas drang srong chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-12: na mo bha ga ba te sh'akya r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-14: na mo aa ka st'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-24: su mu ri tsa ri sarba dushta na bandha bandha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:348a-26: sa ra sa ra ni; kshu kshu kshu /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:350b-15: 'od zer rab tu bkye ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyi ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353a-0: rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag thams cad kyis char @353a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353a-15: bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar gyur tu yang mchi ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353a-18: de'i 'og tu skye tshe'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe 'ur dor ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-5: bu dang tsha bor bcas te 'gum par mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-6: de nas rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-8: klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-9: snying rje ma mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa dag bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-12: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bgrungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-15: gnod par byed pa dag 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-18: dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-20: dus dus su lo tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-25: cho ga rgya cher bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:353b-27: char mi 'bab pa'i dus na des ri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-4: lci bar sreg pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-5: dkyil 'khor dbus zabs khru gang brkos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-6: kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-9: spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-10: de'i dbus su klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-11: ba ser skya'i lci ba dang 'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdengs ka can lus dbyibs dgu par byas te thams cad kyi mgo la yang yid bzhin nor bu bya'o; ;shar phyogs su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-12: lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-13: nub phyogs su klu'i rgyal po chu lha bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-14: byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu ka ra bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-15: de'i g-yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-18: lus dag la spos sna tshogs kyis byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-20: su ra ba ni tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-22: gur gum rnams phye mar byas te gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-24: me tog phreng ba gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-25: gnas de'i dbus su 'bras yos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-26: yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-27: gra bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354a-28: phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-0: mchod @354b rtan ring bsrel dang bcas pa dag gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-1: dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-11: sra rtsi pog dkar po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-12: sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te klu rnams la bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun tu nas phyes padma bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-14: sgo bzhi gtod la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-15: gzhong pa bkang ba bdun bdun gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-17: ci 'byor pa'i ro rnam pa mang po gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-18: me tog sil ma gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-19: bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-20: bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-21: pog por bzhi nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-22: me mar kha brgyad du bud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-23: rig pa 'dzin pas shar gyi sgo ru sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-24: shing ka ra bi ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-25: yungs kar dang ske tshe dmar po bsres te lan brgya rtsa brgyad dor to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-26: dor ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-27: klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-28: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-29: klu de dag thams cad 'dir char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:354b-34: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-0: n'a ga ge sar dang btags pa'i ril bu byas @355a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-1: la; de nas ril bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te klu'i mtshor bor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-2: bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-3: char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-4: gal te de ma thag ma phab na klu de dag thams cad lus zhig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-6: sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-9: sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-10: rtsab mo dkrugs la sngags lan drug cu bzlas pa byas ste khyim gyi nang du pho na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-11: pho ma thag tu klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-12: de'i phyir char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-13: gal te de ma thag tu ma phab na klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-23: ba la sha bsres te bu ram khu bas sbrus la shes rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad bcu bzlas te ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus na ril bu bdun klu'i khyim du bor na nyin mtshan bdun char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-24: gal te 'phral du ma phab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355a-25: de'i phyir klu'i khyim chu thams cad bskams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-0: klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur @355b ro; ;ril bu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te klu'i mtshor gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-1: ba dan sngon po gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-2: sngags 'di bris te der gdags par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-3: ji srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid du klu thams cad char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-4: yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te khang thog mthon por gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-5: ser ba bab pa'i dus na yang klu rnams ser ba 'debs kyang mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-6: klu rnams kyis gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-7: klu thams cad sdangs skrag cing gnas der 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-8: aom su pra te badzra dunde mi li mi li sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-11: bag phye las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugs byas la lus mtshal gyis bsku bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-12: mgul du ba dan gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-13: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tog sil mas gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-14: gtor ma dkar po ci 'byor tshad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-17: bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-18: bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la klu'i gzugs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bya ba pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-19: klu gang gi ming bres pa'i klu de bkug par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-20: klu de yang rang gi khyim la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-21: gal te char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:355b-22: 'phral du srog ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-1: kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad re re la yongs su bzlas pa byas te stong rtsa brgyad du tshang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-2: klu'i gzugs thams cad 'gro zhing mgo gdengs ka byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-3: de'i 'og tu bal po se'u'i lcug mas bsdigs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-4: ldang zhing lce ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-5: lus kyi bar du ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-6: klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-7: gang bsgo ba de bzhin byed do; ;'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-8: yungs kar sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas thams cad gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-9: thams cad la phyir legs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-12: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-13: gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba klu'i rgyal po brgya stong stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-15: sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-16: las sgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-17: bcom ldan 'das; bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra ba bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-18: dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-19: slan chad sems can dag la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356a-20: bcom ldan 'das; bdag cag gis klu mi bgrungs pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa rnams kyi don du dam tshig ma 'tshal ba rnams zlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-0: bcom ldan @356b 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-2: ngas dam tshig gi sngags byin gyis brlab kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-4: na mo bha ga ba te sh'akya mu na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-7: bhu dze bhu dze; sa ma ya bhu dze /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-10: sa manta a'a k'a ra bhu dze /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-12: sa ma ya ba la ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-13: n'a ga ma ra sanytso da ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-15: slad ma'i che slad ma'i dus na klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis klu'i dam tshig gi sngags 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-16: ha cang char che ba'i tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-19: ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-21: de nas klu thams cad bskul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-22: rig pa 'dzin pa des shin tu khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-23: gos gsar pa bgos te klu'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-24: klu'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-25: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-28: klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-29: sku bsil ba'i chab de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:356b-30: de'i nang du yungs kar stsal nas mtshe'u de'i nang du dbo zhing phyogs bzhi nas bdug pas bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-0: de pho ma thag tu skad cig de @357a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-1: la klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du ba lta bu byung nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur te nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-2: ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-3: til bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bgyis te phyogs bzhir bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-4: klu'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-6: klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-9: dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-14: ri'i rtse mor shing aarga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-17: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog gis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-19: sbyin sreg byas ma thag tu char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-20: ha cang yang char che ba'i dus na 'bras yos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-21: yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-22: char chen po bzlog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-24: gal te bdag cag gis dgung gsum gyis char gyi rgyun ma phab na; bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-25: de'i tshe sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357a-26: long ba dang lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-0: dge 'dun slu bar @357b bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-1: 'jig rten gsum slu bar bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-2: bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'pho bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-4: gzhan thams cad la yang sbyor bar bgyid na thams cad rungs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po de dag dbugs phyung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-6: dam tshig la bkod nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la yongs su gtad de rjes su gtad nas sa phyogs de nas gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-9: klu'i dam tshig ces bya ba char 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po yang lhags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-13: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-16: klu'i dbang po mthu che ba thams cad kyang lhags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-17: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-18: rgyal po chen po gser mig gi 'dab ma can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-20: bdag nyid chen po lus 'bar zhing khro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-22: rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-24: gser gyis spras pa'i cod pan mgo la thog pa; gser gyis [?] sa pa drag po'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-26: klu'i dbang po gdan du bting pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:357b-27: g-yog 'khor mang po thams cad dang lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-1: dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-2: rdo rje 'dzin g-yog 'khor rig 'dzin stong lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-4: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa; mu tig dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-5: khang pa brtsegs pa na zham ring chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-8: 'od zer sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis sku ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-10: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-13: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-17: shin tu rnam par dag cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-18: shin tu dri ma dang skyon med pa'i 'od ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas sku la 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-23: dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam bu'i gling na klu mi bgrungs pas sad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358a-26: ser sprin phab ste me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358b-3: sman gyi bar bsregs te ma rungs par byas nas yal ga yang 'dzam bu'i gling na med par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358b-4: de na sems can de dag sdug bsngal chen pos gzir cing nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ba thos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:358b-7: dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363a-6: yang dang yang char gyi rgyun 'bebs so; ;gang gi tshe char dgos pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas chu dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas mthon por song la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas chu snyim pa bdun la sngags lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzlas te shar phyogs su gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363a-7: klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'phral du gcig tu 'dus te char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363a-20: gcin blangs la sab ta byi sa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-0: thams cad @363b bsres la lan dgu bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-1: de nas klu mgo lnga pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-2: mgo gdengs ka can gyi skyil mo krung bcas pa lus gcus pa byas te tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-3: gur gum gyis lus bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-4: stan gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-5: dar gyi cod pan gyi dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-6: me tog gi phreng ba gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-7: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sil ma gtor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-8: bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-9: mda' bzhi btsugs te dar gyi ba dan dkar po bzhi gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-11: dkyil 'khor gra bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-12: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas lan lnga bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-13: kun la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-14: bum pa'i mgul dar gyis bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-22: sha ka ra dang bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-24: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas shin tu khrus byas te gos gtsang ma gyon la sngags 'di nyid kyis nye reg dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:363b-32: klu kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la rig pa 'dzin pa klu la bltas te skyil mo krung du 'dug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-0: @364a *// sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-2: bdug pas slar btang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-3: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re la bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-4: mar me kha bzhi bud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-6: gang bos pa de 'greng bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-7: bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-8: klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-10: ci bsam pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-11: dbang thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-15: tsha bor bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-16: las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-17: rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-18: klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-20: lang long med par gzhag cing mi mthong bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-21: su la yang mi bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-23: nam dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ba byas te bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-24: dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-25: gar btab pa der 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-26: rmi lam du dgos pa thams cad ston cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-27: klu'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364a-28: gang gi tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-0: sad byung ba @364b de'i tshe ske tshe'i 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-1: yungs kar du bsres la lan brgya rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te khros pas klu'i gzugs la bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-2: skad cig de la rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-6: than pa byung ba de'i tshe yi ger bris la skud pa dmar po la dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-7: skad cig de la char gyi rgyun 'bebs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-8: sgrub pa pos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-10: skud pa sngon po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun bor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-11: char chen po mi 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-12: cho ga dang rig pa sgrub pa gzhan thams cad la yang sngags 'di thog ma kho nar lan bdun brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-15: nam mkha' lding chen po rdo rje shugs 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-16: de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i snying po'i cho ga bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-17: gzungs bton ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad 'dar yed yed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-18: bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:364b-19: shing ka ra b'i ra'i lcug mas rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-0: ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas khang steng du dkyil 'khor grva bzhi pa shin tu rnam par phye ba re'u cha legs par byas te seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa brgyad @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-4: mda' bzhi la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa bzhis 'khor bar bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-5: bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-7: gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-8: gtor ma dkar pos bkang pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-9: me tog sil mas gang bar gtor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-10: bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-11: thams cad la lan bdun bdun gyis bzlas pa byas te gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-12: yungs kar dang chu bsres la bzlas pa byas pas phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-13: de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-14: der klu mi srun pa rnams 'phrog mi nus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-15: klu chen po rnams kyang rtag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-19: 'bras bu thams cad la 'tshe yang mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-20: lan 'ga' yang rtsva'i lo ma la yang 'tshe mi nus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-21: bcing ba lngas bsdams te thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-22: 'di zla ba brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365a-28: gsang ba pa de rnams gnas 'di las mi 'da'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas @365b klu bzlog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-1: shin tu khros pas bzlog par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-3: klu'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-4: mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdengs ka ltar byas la mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-6: klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-7: brjod ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-8: gal te klu dag phyogs de ma rungs par bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-9: de'i tshe bye mtshan mgo la 'bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-12: khog pa ji tsam pa de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-13: de nas klu thams cad sdangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-14: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-15: klu mi pa grungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-16: khang steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la bdug pas bdugs te bum pa chus gang ba thams cad la lan bdun du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-18: seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-22: sad kyi nyes ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-23: phur bu ma phyung gi bar du thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-24: yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la sprin la bltas te gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:365b-25: ser ba thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-0: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i lcug ma @366a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-1: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gdu bur byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-2: thams cad du ser ba chod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-3: shing k'a ra b'i ra dmar po'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te glog 'byung ba'i tshe nam mkha' la 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-4: nam mkha' nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-5: chu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-7: 'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-8: rtse gsum pa ma byung gi bar du 'brug zer te sprin bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-10: ral gri la lan bdun bzlas te klu'i phyag rgya skyil mo krung gis bzung la bltas te 'dug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-11: bzung ma thag tu klu mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-12: klu thams cad lkugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-13: ral gri thogs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gur gum gyis de'i steng du nam mkha' lding bris nas ji lta ji lta bur bskor ba de lta bur nam mkha' lding 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'bab par 'gyur te klu thams cad skrag cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-15: ser ba 'bebs mi nus so; ;shing ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-16: yungs kar ba sres te dkyil 'khor du lan drug cu sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366a-17: klu thams cad grang ba'i stobs byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-0: kha @366b ba'i bar la sogs pa thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-1: gang gi tshe char dgos par gyur pa de'i tshe char 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-2: spra tshil las klu'i gzugs tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te gser gyis g-yogs la steng gos dkar pos g-yogs te rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-3: bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste lus gos kyis dkri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-5: ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor la bdug pas bdugs te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-6: bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas te bum pa la dal bu dal bus gzhug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-7: ser ba thams cad bum pa'i nang du 'pho'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-8: klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-9: klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs spra tshil la byas pa la klu thams cad kyis ming bris na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-10: gang gi ming gis rigs brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-11: 'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing bsgo ba de thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-12: klu'i rgyal po chos can ma yin pa yul yongs su mi skyong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-13: lo tog dang 'bras bu chud gzon pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste shin tu khrus byas la gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-14: klu'i khyim de nas bud med rgan mo dag 'byung zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:366b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa ci tshol zhes zer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-1: par rdo rje sa la brdal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-2: phat ces bya ba brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-3: klu rgan mo de dus nas shi'o shi'o zhes zer zhing khyim du 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-4: de nas klu rnams 'dus te sngangs skrag ste khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-5: rig pa 'dzin pas sngar sngags brjod la khros pas bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sa la brdabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-6: khye'u gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-7: kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-8: rig pa 'dzin pas snying rje med par bya ste; bsgyel ba'i tshul bsgyel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-9: 'di skad ces kye rig pa 'dzin pa bsgo ba thams cad bgyid do smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-10: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig srungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-13: rig pa 'dzin pas yang 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-16: rig pa 'dzin pas yang gsum la skyabs su gsol btang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-18: rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bzlas pa rjes su zung shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-22: gdod phur bu dbyung ngo zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-23: 'on tang klu de 'khor dang bcas te rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367a-24: gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-0: dge ba bcu'i las @367b kyi lam rjes su sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-1: dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-2: de nas gdod phur bu phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-3: klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-4: rang gi khyim du 'jug pa bzhin du zhugs shing las su bya ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-6: bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro; ;klu'i khyim der phyis klu mi srun pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-7: dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-8: dus dus su lo tog sgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-11: lo ma rnams sgrub bo; ;phyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-12: bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs chen po las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-16: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bya ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-17: de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-19: bdag cag gis klu thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-20: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-22: ser ba thams cad zlog pa me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:367b-24: lo tog thams cad sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-0: rdo rje'i mchu glog 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i @368a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-2: sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-3: de byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-5: nam mkha' lding gi bdag po rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi nam mkha' lding gi bdag po klu mi srun pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir smos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-6: de nas nam mkha' lding gi bdag pos rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-8: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-9: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-10: na ma stree lo kya aa dhi pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-11: na ma:tsa tur na mo mah'a r'a dz'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-16: ma ni ka na ka bi tsi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-17: a'a ba ra na bi bh'u shi ta sha r'i re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-20: n'a ga r'a dza bi dr'a ba ni hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:368a-21: spho ta ya badzra dunta na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-2: ma h'a badzra dzva la sv'ah'a; sarba dushtan n'a ga ga bi n'a sha k'a ya sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-5: sarba n'a sh'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-11: phat phat phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-12: nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos rdo rje mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas bub tu 'gyel nas lus rdul byung zhing lus rab tu 'dar te brgyal nas sa la 'gre ldog go /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-15: thams cad lus 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-21: bdag cag slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du ma rungs par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-24: lo tog ma rungs par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-26: sa phyogs 'di mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-27: gang na cho ga'i rgyal po chen po 'di spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-28: gang na gnas pas spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369a-29: bdag cag gis rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-7: dus ma lags pa'i sprin thams cad snum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-12: ro bro ba'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-14: lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-16: sdig pa thams cad byang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-17: ltas ngan pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-18: dus dus su char gyi rgyun dbab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-21: lo tog rnams yang dag par 'grub par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-33: ri skegs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad med par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-36: nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-39: slan chad sdig pa'i las kun tu spyod pa'i tshul mi spyod par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-41: dus ma lags pa'i char thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-43: rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis gnas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:369b-45: dkon mchog gsum gyi dgongs pa bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-0: slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar @370a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-2: bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung bzhin du slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-8: lo legs pa kun tu bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po la dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-13: de nas de'i 'og tu cho ga bya bar brjod par bya ste; sngags 'di dpa' ba gcig pu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-14: las kun byed pa dge ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-15: shes rab can gyis lan gcig dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-16: dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-17: mthon po'i gnas su mkhas pa yis; ;sgra skad chen po brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-18: gnas gang dang gang du sgra bsgrags pa de dang der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-22: glog thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370a-23: sus kyang byin 'phrog par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-0: gnas khang shin tu mtho ba der rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te gos gtsang ma dkar po bgos la kha shar phyogs su bltas te ba'i lci ba dang 'ji ma pa bsres pas dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi @370b pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mda' gang tsam pa zhig btsugs te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa btsugs te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas la tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lan gsum mkhris par bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pog phor bzhag la lan bdun bzlas pa'i bdug pas bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-4: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas la yungs kar gyis gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-5: me tog sil mas gang bar gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-6: phyogs bzhir gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-13: chu dang yungs kar la sngags lan lnga brjod de phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-14: zla ba nya la sbyor ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-15: skad cher bklags la phyogs bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-17: 'og tu yungs kar gtor zhing klu thams cad kyi so so'i ming nas brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-18: cho ga 'di byas ma thag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-21: klu mi srun pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:370b-31: srin po thams cad rgyang ring du spangs bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-7: phyir gnod par byed pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-10: lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-11: legs par yongs su smin pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-16: byad stems thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-18: ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-19: de srid du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-23: gang dang gang du dgos par 'gyur ba thams cad lan gcig dran par byas na 'grub par 'gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-26: klu rgyal gdan du bting ba; mgo dgu pa mgo rgyan du thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-27: klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g-yas na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371a-28: nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g-yon na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-0: gser gyis g-yogs par @371b byas ta cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-1: stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la nyin zhag gcig la sngags stong brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-7: mar me btang la de'i mdun du nyal na ston par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-8: las thams cad brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-10: las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-11: ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-12: lang long med pa'i gnas su bzhag la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-15: 'phral du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-16: gal te 'phral du char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-17: de'i phyir klu'i gnas kun tu nam mkha' lding gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-18: gnas me lce gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-21: than pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:371b-28: skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-0: dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun tu ser ba mi @372a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-5: rlung 'khrugs pa'i tshe lam gyi bzhi mdor gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-6: yang na grong khyer gyi sgor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-7: yang na rgyal po'i sgor gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-8: des rlung thams cad chod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-9: rlung chen po rnam par 'thor rlung yang chod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-10: phyis ldang mi nus so; ;bstan ma thag tu klu thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-11: rdo rje mchu'i gzungs las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-12: nam mkha' lding bklags pas grub pa mchog tu 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-16: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372a-18: bdag cag thams cad tshogs pas kyang rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bgyi pa'i gzungs brjod par bya ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs @372b pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-6: sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-8: bde ba'i phyir ngas byin gyi rlabs kyi rjod cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-13: na mo bha ga ba te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-22: dza ya mah'a ba la b'irya pa ra kro dha ra brahma dza brahma sa ra /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-24: ma ro brahma d'ante n'a ma m'urt'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-25: pra ta ya h'um h'um phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-46: spho ta ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:372b-47: sam ha ra sam ha ra /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-1: sma ra bho n'a ga aa dhi pa te badzra ba ya bho bho tu ti tu ti h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-5: buddha bi lo ka t'i ya sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-9: tsa tur ma h'a r'a dza sa ma ya dha r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-11: n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-12: aom dhi ri dhi ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-13: dzva li ta w'a ka tr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-14: ro ma h'a ra n'a sha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-15: dzu ti dzu ti dzu ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-16: phat phat phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-17: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu mi srun pa thams cad lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-18: lus shig shig por gyur cing sha bkras btab par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-22: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-27: slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-29: bcom ldan 'das; rdo rje 'bar ba'i lca 'bab pa'i mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod pa der bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373a-30: klu thams cad gnod par sems shing mi mchi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-0: tha na lta bar yang mi bgyid @373b na; 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-1: de nas de'i chog brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-2: gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'brul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-3: lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-4: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-5: klu thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-6: dpag tshad bdun kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-7: rdo rje la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te klu bzlog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-11: ser ba thams cad zlog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-13: dran pa tsam gyis ser ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-14: gal te 'bab na yang yud tsam gyis chur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-15: ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na rdo rje bskor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-16: phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'drim par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-17: phyogs der ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-18: nang par dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog tu zhugs la skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-19: sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-20: brjod ma thag tu rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-22: ser ba thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-23: rlung thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-25: yungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-26: lo gcig khyud kor du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:373b-29: ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-1: bu dang tsha bo 'khor dang bcas pa rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-2: las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro; ;dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dkrol na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-3: klu mi srun pa thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-4: nam mkha' las sa la lhung bar 'gyur te; las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-6: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-10: dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-12: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-15: snying rje med pa 'tshe ba rnams gdul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-17: chad pas gcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod nas 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa legs so legs so; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-18: klu'i rgyal po chen po gdugs kyi rnam pas kun nas bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-19: gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374a-20: gzhan yang klu mi srun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-1: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-5: yal ga rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-6: yongs su bskyang bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-11: tshad pa thams cad bzlog par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-12: dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-13: rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bskyang bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-14: sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs shing bsam par grub par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-17: gal te cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gong du sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-18: gzungs ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang 'gal bar bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-19: bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-32: slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi srun pa rnams 'jig par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-35: dus ma lags pa'i char dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:374b-40: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-0: ri'am khang pa mthon po'i steng du rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te @375a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-1: mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-2: chu dang yungs kar bsres pas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-3: gtor cing dran ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rnams dum bu brgyar 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-6: de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; klu'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-8: khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-008:375a-9: rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
